parse.title: List of group-1 ISBN publisher codes

text.*:
See also: List of group-0 ISBN publisher codes
This article does not cite any sources. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (December 2015) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

A list of publisher codes for (978) International Standard Book Numbers with a group code of one. (Data from published items by these publishers.)

The group-1 publisher codes are assigned as follows:

Publisher number Item number Group identifier Total possible books
From To Number of possible publisher codes Books per publisher
2 digits 6 digits 1-00-xxxxxx-x 1-09-xxxxxx-x 10 1,000,000 10,000,000
3 digits 5 digits 1-100-xxxxx-x 1-399-xxxxx-x 300 100,000 30,000,000
4 digits 4 digits 1-4000-xxxx-x 1-5499-xxxx-x 1,500 10,000 15,000,000
5 digits 3 digits 1-55000-xxx-x 1-86979-xxx-x 31,980 1,000 31,980,000
6 digits 2 digits 1-869800-xx-x 1-998999-xx-x 129,200 100 12,920,000
7 digits 1 digit 1-9990000-x-x 1-9999999-x-x 10,000 10 100,000
Total Possible Group-1 Codes: 172,990 -- 100,000,000

Contents

  • 1 2-digit publisher codes (00-09)
  • 2 3-digit publisher codes (100-399)
  • 3 4-digit publisher codes (4000-5499)
  • 4 5-digit publisher codes (55000–86979)
  • 5 6-digit publisher codes (869800-999999)
  • 6 See also
  • 7 References
  • 8 External links

2-digit publisher codes (00-09)[edit]

This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.
Publisher code Publisher Additional imprints Notes
01 Pyramid Books e.g. ISBN 1-01-502772-5
02 Berkley Publishing e.g. ISBN 1-02-541870-0
04 Popular Library e.g. ISBN 1-04-500045-0
05 DAW Books e.g. ISBN 1-05-100237-0
06 Uncertain Celestial Publications e.g. ISBN 1-06-834424-5
07 Scholastic Books e.g. ISBN 1-07-223052-6
